document.full_text: injuries to other cubs outfielders have led to more playing time for tony campana, who has held his own, hitting .240 with five steals through friday. the lessons of his childhood are never far from his mind.
document.title: the cubs' cincinnati kid
lines_and_colors: injuries to other cubs outfielders have led to more playing time for tony campana, who has held his own, hitting .240 with five steals through friday. the lessons of his childhood are never far from his mind.
